scene.name: intro
scene.option: How's it going, {if}[dog-nameless]old man{end}{if}[!dog-nameless]${dog-name}{end}?
{if}[dog-nameless]Old man{end}{if}[!dog-nameless]${dog-name}{end}, this is Shannon.

scene.name: hows-it-going
scene.option: Sorry I left you alone so long.
Hurt my leg pretty bad down there.

scene.name: alone
scene.option: What would you have done if I hadn't come back?
What did you get into up here?

scene.name: hadnt-come-back
scene.option: It'll be one of us, eventually. Oh well.
Nah, I'll keep coming back.

scene.name: what-dog-did
scene.option: Did you take a nap?
Did you find any rabbits?

scene.name: leg
scene.option: I've got a shuffle like you now.
Seems pretty bad, if I'm honest.

scene.name: shuffle
scene.option: Yeah we've got a lot in common.
Maybe we can still heal up.

scene.name: pretty-bad
scene.option: How much time do you think I have left getting around on two legs?
Well, I'm not worried if you're not.

scene.name: introduce-shannon
scene.option: Nice to meet you{if}[!dog-nameless], ${dog-name}{end}.
I never had a dog.

scene.name: nice-to-meet-dog
scene.option: I've got some dried banana slices in my bag, would you like one?
Do you help with the driving?

scene.name: shannon-gave-treat
scene.option: I don't really like them anyway.
Take care of your friend here, and there's more where that came from.

scene.name: help-with-driving
scene.option: Maybe you can help your friend here, too.
You help with the drooling, looks like.

scene.name: never-had-a-dog
scene.option: My folks worked alternating shifts for a while.
Dad was allergic.

scene.name: alternating-shifts
scene.option: No time to care for a dog.
And then they finally got their shifts in sync ...

scene.name: allergic
scene.option: He needed to be able to breath clearly. At home, anyway.
I would have liked a dog, though.
